results.name: GROW! (Diego Pontes, Jos Andrade, Bubbles949, mi-ky, LV)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This will run on your grandma's gamer PC.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you clean the crust of your PC it will run better.

results.name: The Story of the Hero's Adventure

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
